DYOR: Do Your Own Octopus Research üêô

Our Telegram Group is community-run, we use Snapshot for governance, and we are verified on Etherscan.

Total $OCTO supply is 800k, with 200k allocated to interest program, and 275k to project reserve.

200k sold to early backers ($0.18), and 125k to public via bonding curve distribution (to $1.08).

Read our blog, follow us on twitter, watch our github repos, subscribe to our Telegram Channel, join the community Telegram Group, send us an email, peruse the documentation, and subscribe to our mailing list below.
